content: the vintage bruges lace making technique was traditionally used for embellishing garments tablecloths and doilies but we love the way it is adapted here for this beautiful modern day crochet throw **gauge ** 1 pattern repeat = 4 10 cm in row 3 pattern repeat consists of one single_crochet one shell next single_crochet and 5 double_crochet 6 row = 4 10 cm
